attributes.action: Create a UK Department of government efficiency (DOGE). Immediately
attributes.additional_details: UK govt needs efficiency dept for fiscal responsibility, cutting waste, streamlining ops, setting performance metrics, fostering innovation, restructuring, boosting public trust, environmental efficiency, and economic resilience. This could transform public service delivery.
attributes.background: Set up a department designed to reduce unnecessary and wasteful government spending

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Create the Department of Government Efficiency
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701630
